moves.4. d3 Be7 5. O-O Nc6 6. a3: for my bishop, in case, and to avoid a knight on b4
moves.6... Bf6 7. Re1 g6: well this is very strange... Look like he constructed an expensive fianchetto
moves.8. Nc3 Na5 9. Ba2 c5: looks like he does not want to castle... his knight on g8 is a weakness now... I think from now how to exploit this.
moves.12. b4 cxb4 13. axb4 Nd4 14. Nxd4 Bxd4 1: do you see this beautiful place on d6?
moves.16. f4 Bb8 17. Bc3: and his bishop could not protect that diagonal anymore
moves.19... Bxd6 20. exd6: brave soldier in front... shall i lose him?
moves.20... b5: well i thought about Qb8, but the result is the same.
moves.23... Bc8 24. Rxf6+: well, the next moves were very clear to me... And it seems that it was obvious to my opponent. He resigned here without a word. I have no news from him. Boris, if you want to talk about, be my guest.
